When you use your Meta account to access MPT Products, we process your information as described in the Meta Privacy Policy under "How do we use your information?" and as described below for each MPT Product.
If you choose to enable Natural Facial Expressions in Meta Quest Pro, we process abstracted facial expressions data so that your avatar's expressions look more natural.
If you choose to enable fit adjustment in Meta Quest Pro, we process abstracted fit adjustment data to check whether your headset is aligned optimally and provide headset adjustment tips.

If you choose to enable eye tracking in Meta Quest Pro, we process abstracted gaze data to improve your image quality, help you interact with virtual content in an app, and to animate your avatar's eye and facial movements.

However, you can also choose to share information with third-party services from Meta VR Products, for example: If you enable eye tracking or Natural Facial Expressions in Meta Quest Pro, apps can access your abstracted gaze or abstracted facial expressions data.

If you choose to enable hand and body tracking in Meta VR Products, we process abstracted hand and body data to allow you to switch between hands and controllers to interact with your surroundings and have a more seamless or immersive experience.

Additional Data is used by Meta for these purposes only if you choose to opt in.
